title: My Google Pixel 4a 5g is not making any noise
content: Last night my phone ran out of battery, and ever since, I have tried to do everything to fix it,  from resetting the phone, setting it to safe mode, to factory resetting it, and I still get the same problem. When the phone powers on, it says "System UI not responding" with the options "Close" and "Wait". pressing close shuts off the phone for a second but when I open calls, youtube, and spotify, no sound comes out still. pressing "wait" does nothing. I have now lost all my files because of this issue and because google has a "backup data" but not a "restore data".
